# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(omni LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(omni "" src/window.cpp src/window.h)
set_target_properties(omni PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "omni")
set_target_properties(omni PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/mingw/x86_64/debug")
target_include_directories(omni PRIVATE
    D:/toolkits/msys64/clang64/bin/../include
    D:/toolkits/msys64/clang64/bin/../include/SDL2
)
target_compile_options(omni PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(omni PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(omni PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(omni PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(omni PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET omni PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(omni PRIVATE
    mingw32
    SDL2main
    SDL2
)
target_link_directories(omni PRIVATE
    D:/toolkits/msys64/clang64/bin/../lib
)
target_link_options(omni PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(omni PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
